ReadJson(JsonReader, Type, MetadataDocument?, bool, JsonSerializer)

Reads the JSON representation of the object.

public override MetadataDocument? ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, MetadataDocument? existingValue, bool hasExistingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)

Parameters

reader JsonReader

The Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader to read from.

objectType Type

Type of the object.

existingValue MetadataDocument

The existing value of object being read. If there is no existing value then null will be used.

hasExistingValue bool

The existing value has a value.

serializer JsonSerializer

The calling serializer.

MetadataDocument

The object value.
